content: the z/VM INSTALLATION PLANNING PANEL 2, as shown in Figure 5-29. Figure 5-29 z/VM Installation DASD volume labels and addresses. The processing results of this panel are the message that INSTPLAN EXEC ended successfully. 8. Press F5. You see a summary of your values, and the following message: ... HCPINP8392I INSTPLAN EXEC ENDED SUCCESSFULLY. IUGIPX8475I Final selections display The products you selected to load to minidisk are: NONE The products you selected to load to SFS are: VM DIRM ICKDSF PERFTK RACF RSCS TCPIP VMHCD The system default language selected: AMENG The common service filepool name is: VMPSFS The install type you selected is: Non-SSI The system name is: RDBKZVMF The DASD type you selected to load on is: 3390 - 10016 cylinders The volumes needed to load z/VM are: COMMON: VMCOM1 RELEASE: 720RL1 SYSTEM: M01RES M01S01 M01P01 Do you want to continue ? (Y/N) *** z/VM INSTALLATION VOLUME DEFINITION ***2 TYPE LABEL ADDRESS FORMAT (Y/N) COMMON VMFOM1 923E____ _ RELVOL VMFRL1
